name: df-dveca
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cdveca, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), ccom(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(cfv(cedring, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), csn(cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s4, s2, cfv(cfv(ctendo, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s2)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ DVecA =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶({ <(Base ` ndx),((LTrn ` s0)` s1)>, <(+ ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1), s3 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àò s3))>, <(Scalar ` ndx),((EDRing ` s0)` s1)> } ‚ãÉ { <(√ó ` ndx),(s4 ‚àà((TEndo ` s0)` s1), s2 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1)‚Ü¶(s4 ` s2))> })))
comment: Define constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2013.)
